did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Building committee meeting minutes; historic record of the Ogden Center; trustee meeting minutes; session meeting minutes and records of baptisms and memberships; and session meeting minutes.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Building committee meeting minutes (1849-1874); historic record of the Ogden Center (1858-1866); trustee meeting minutes (1849-1880); session meeting minutes and records of baptisms and memberships (1825-1851); and session meeting minutes (1851-1876).
